title: owncloud.log: iswebdavworking: no - reason: forbidden (sabre_dav_exception_forbidden)
body:
i got the following warning in my owncloud instance:

```
iswebdavworking: no - reason: forbidden (sabre_dav_exception_forbidden)
```

also there is a red warning on top of the admin page:

dein web-server ist noch nicht fã¼r datei-synchronisation bereit, weil die webdav-schnittstelle vermutlich defekt ist.	 bitte prã¼fen sie die installationsanleitungen.

i track it down to https://github.com/owncloud/3rdparty/blob/master/sabre/dav/client.php#l422. therefore i look into $response and get following message:

```
you don't have permission to access /~mjob/core/remote.php/webdav/ on this server.
additionally, a 404 not found error was encountered while trying to use an errordocument to handle the request.
apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu) server at 192.168.122.76 port 80
[statuscode] => 403 [headers] => array ( [date] => mon, 13 may 2013 12:56:19 gmt [server] => apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu) [vary] => accept-encoding [content-length] => 430 [content-type] => text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 ) )
```

then i try to connect via /~mjob/core/remote.php/webdav/ and get a password prompt, entered my credentials and get the correct files/folders displayed.

why is there such an warning? webdav seems to work? and it raises an error, that it cann't connect due to login prompt, which is supposed.

due to this, no client can connect to my owncloud. suggestions?

### client version:

firefox 20
chromium 26

### server version:

ubuntu 12.04 - updated to latest (1h ago)
modules dav, dav_fs and dav_lock are disabled
owncloud - latest master (right now)

### logs
#### web server error log
```
[mon may 13 14:56:19 2013] [error] [client 192.168.122.76] client denied by server configuration: /home/mjob/public_html/core/remote.php
[mon may 13 14:56:19 2013] [error] [client 192.168.122.76] file does not exist: /var/www/core
```
#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"core","message":"iswebdavworking: no - reason: forbidden (sabre_dav_exception_forbidden)","level":2,"time":"may 13, 2013 13:05:56"}
```

#### browser log
empty
